description: I have more than six years of experience including software engineer, application support, and IT programming also as ESB Developer, working with various Microsoft Ecosystem technologies, IBM Product and other tools such as Redis, ElasticSearch etc. I am passionate about learning new skills and staying updated with the latest trends and innovations in the field. I believe that there is no age limit for learning, and that learning keeps me young and motivated.
detailOrQuote: I am passionate about solving problems in creative new ways to drive innovation. Leveraging my experience as a software engineer, I continue to look for new and better ways to make technology accessible to everyone without barriers.
